  • Method Details

    • writePageToFile

      public static void writePageToFile()
      Method used to download the specified HTML source page and conduct basic text filtering. Filters text based on individual line contents.

    • readText

      public static java.lang.String readText​(java.util.Scanner scan)
      This method scans the text from the specified webpage. It will scan all the text until there are no more lines to scan.
      Parameters:
      scan - The parameter is a scanner.
      Returns:
      It will return the content that was scanned.

    • checkLineContent

      public static boolean checkLineContent​(java.lang.String reader)
      This method reads a string and returns true if it contains strings of interest.
      Parameters:
      reader - This is the string that will be evaluated.
      Returns:
      It will return true if the string contains the strings of interest.
